channel.title: Writing & Talking on Christian Kündig
channel.description: Recent content in Writing & Talking on Christian Kündig

item.title: Product Management Night
item.description: On November 3rd I had the pleasure to present at the Product Management Night series of the Product Management Festival in Zurich. This time it was held held at the beautiful NZZ foyer next to the opera house. My presentation focused on how we build deep-tech products a Scandit and how PMs connect technological capabilities and customer value. I really enjoyed sharing my experiences and connecting with other product managers in my city.

item.title: Zürcher Journalistenpreis 2010
item.description: Im Mai 2010 gewannen Lukas Messmer und ich den Zürcher Journalistenpreis für unsere Reportage “Die Endstation” in der Zürcher Studierendenzeitung (ZS).

item.title: Master Thesis: Building an adapting Poker Agent
item.description: I wrote a learning poker bot for my master thesis. This was just at the cusp of the deep learning breakthroughs to come soon after.
